alert.note: Alert for Eastern Chichagof Island; Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued April 05 at 2:35PM AKDT until April 07 at 12:00PM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...East to southeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Portions of the central Inner Channels including Juneau and Tenakee Springs. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for aviation and high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Confidence in high winds occurring has lowered due to latest models showing the storm tracking more offshore. The forecast will continue to be monitored.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Chichagof Island; Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island
